summary: Family blog with like and comment functionality

existing_features.title: Display like count and like button on the post detail page
Display all comments for a blog post on the post detail page in chronological order
Add a comment form on the post detail page allowing users to submit new comments
Display like count preview on the home page for each blog post
Create React Query hooks for like and comment operations with automatic cache invalidation

new_feature_requests.summary: Add like functionality to blog posts
Add comment functionality to blog posts
Add a like counter to each blog post that tracks the total number of likes
Implement backend function to increment the like count for a blog post
Add a comments array to each blog post that stores comment data including author name, content, and timestamp
Implement backend function to add a new comment to a blog post
